reviews.review_msg: The basic concepts of this course are easy, but Mandana sometimes complicates them. Attendance is mandatory. If this is a required course, make sure to remember everything, focus on what she says, and apply it (she'll test this). Having an appointment with her might help, as she can give you some advice to improve your studying and presentation.

She is so sweet. I don't understand how students can hate her, I think it is possible only if they are lazy and do not want to do anything and get good grades. Very caring, and helpful. She also replies to emails quickly. If it was possible I would take every course with her!

I with my friend have finished 2 courses with Prof. Mandana this semester. It were the most interesting courses we have ever taken here. In my opinion it is one of the best professors you can find here. 
(But be ready to participate in classes, it is real matters)

This semester I took 2 courses(BPK140 and HSCI160) with Mandana, and do not understand these reviews and the low ratings. She is an amazing prof, her slides are clear, and her explanation is as well. She is always welcome to answer questions either during the class or after. Courses are interesting and a bit difficult but you will learn a lot.
Easy class but uncaring and hard to deal with if you have problems. Pick another Prof or prepare for stress if you run into problems.

She is a wonderful presenter but a horrible teacher. She does not specify or highlight what is important. There is an abundance of information and the class dropped my GPA when I took it as a GPA booster. I am disappointed and I generally do well in my classes. I: The rest of the class didn't seem to do very well, average was fairly low.
She is the best prof ever! She is strict and yes, she should be. People especially women feel jealous at her because she is beautiful and smart.

Mandana was a really nice prof and everything. However, her exams were quite difficult if you don't pay attention to everything she says in lecture. Quizzes every tutorial which were helpful to know what you were learning.

Had a good sense of humour, but came across as a little condescending to students. Mandatory tutorial as there is a quiz every week. Liked to stick to the textbook but everything was straightforward and overall a fair class.

In general she made rude comments, did not answer questions, cut students off and was very good at making students feel stupid. She copies straight from the textbook and is very picky with her marking especially about spelling. There is a quiz every week so attending tutorials is mandatory if not you will receive a zero for that quiz.

In general she makes rude remarks,talks over you, doesn't answer your questions and is very good at making students feel stupid. she is very picky; marks for detail and spelling even if you miss an E at the end of a word you get the answer incorrect. She copies straight from the text, there is a quiz every week so you must attend all tutorials.

very easy class, attend all lectures to complete participation activities which are free marks, also there are weekly online participation activities that are free marks if you do them. Exams consisted of MC, TF, fill in the blank, and short answers. Everything was easy but fill in the blank was a little tricky. Overall very easy to get high mark
Mike is a good teacher! He is very knowledgeable on the subject. He does not require a textbook for the course and he gives you all his notes. I would recommend him.
